reviewText: I've watched 30 seconds of the movie and I can tell it's in terrible quality looks like it was recorded in EP speed. Looks like Amazon is saying that when sold on demand they  made it  DVD-R recordable media which that must mean Amazon  made and shipped it with bad quality I cannot believe I paid $17 that's pathetic. It is a very good love story none the less I like the movie.
Had already seen the movie and read the novel. I bought this a present for somebody who knew the novel but was unaware of the excellent movie version.
A EUROPEAN STYLE MOVIE...SLOW TO START BUT WHEN IT PICKS UP IT'S VERY INTERESTING...PERFORMANCES BY JOHN TUTURRO AND EMILY WATSON ARE EXCELLENT !!
A wonderful gem of a film. I've watched it many times.
Wonderful movie. John Tururro is amazing at getting in the head of Luzhin and Emily Watson is just captivating to watch as she slowly falls in love with this Chess obsessed man.
